website_summaries.verdict: An attractive and sturdy option, but be prepared for frequent bulb changes if you choose this model.
pros: Antique-style lights deliver a soft glow
Multiple strands are easily connected for continuous lighting
cons: Strands are heavy and awkward to hang
Only 48 feet yet pricier than some longer strands

website_summaries.verdict: Not only will these brighten the Christmas season, they will last you for years on end.
pros: Off the charts in terms of durability and performance
Will please both aesthetically as well as in terms of functionality
cons: They are not cheap, but you are paying for high-quality construction

customer_reviews.title: These lights are definitely commercial grade. I ran two ...
customer_reviews.text: These lights are definitely commercial grade. I ran two galvanized wires from my house to fence about 22' apart and ran the lights back and forth with zip ties. It worked perfectly,
customer_reviews.author: Steven Johnson

customer_reviews.title: How I installed them
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say anything that hasn’t already been said in all of he other 5 star reviews, I’ll jus add some photos of how I installed them. Recommend using 1/8” stainless steel cable (Home Depot $40/125’) and turnbuckles (Amazon $20/6 pack). Use extra clamps and a wire loop along the way to make a positive stop on the cable as tie wraps alone won’t keep the lights from sliding.
customer_reviews.author: James Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service and reliability.
customer_reviews.text: When I put the lights up for my party, they all worked. After about 5 hours I went to unplug the lights and noticed 1 light bulb was not working. Brightech had contacted me asking how things were and I informed them of the situation. They said they would get back to me, but it's been a few days and no response. Conclusion, poor customer service and poor reliability.
customer_reviews.author: bhaloo

customer_reviews.title: I loved the lights as soon as i put them in ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved the lights as soon as i put them in my backyard but in less than a month 15 light sockets just went out! So disappointed. I wanted to order more but with half of them not working in less that a month i can not trust this product.
customer_reviews.author: Karla C.

customer_reviews.title: Almost burned down my apartment
customer_reviews.text: These were nice at first. I had them hanging on a railing outside for a couple weeks and had no complaints. I later brought them in to my apartment and plugged them in. I noticed the carpet start smoking. One of the T's where a bulb hangs off was burning my carpet. Must have been shorted wires in that junction. Throwing this away. Hopefully my landlord doesn't notice the black scorch marks.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great lights but no bulb replacements
customer_reviews.text: I bought these lights in 2018 and I love them. They are sturdy and look great. The only problem is a year later, all my bulbs have blown out and Brightech does not make the exact bulb replacement. I looked online, called the company - no such luck. The company tells you to replace the bulbs with an LED bulb they carry, which is much whiter and brighter than the original bulbs (check the multiple comments on Amazon). I loved these original lights but now have spent hours and a lot of postage trying to find bulb replacements. I wish Brightech would just make the EXACT SAME BULB.
customer_reviews.author: Steenie

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for my porch.
customer_reviews.text: These worked great in our covered porch. The product is heavy duty and came supplied with 16 bulbs (one spare), fortunately for me I did not have any broken bulbs as in other reviews I've read. This string of lights worked great as a part of my project where I added Ball mason jars as the globes. It wasn't an issue for me but the product description here states that the lights are "a generous 3 feet of spacing in between each socket" which was inaccurate, the product I received the spacing was at 30" between each socket.
customer_reviews.author: StevenH

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 strands in November, and as of March each strand has lost at least one bulb fixture. It looks like the wire casing dries up and the whole fixture falls off. The company, Brightech, claims in its description that it is for outdoor use and is waterproof so I’m not sure why this happened. And with those claims, they only allow a one month return policy. Not sure how I can get a hold of anyone from Brightech to find out what my options are. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality product
customer_reviews.text: I received this product unsure due to the length between lights which was 3 feet. We have a 10x10 patio and it fit all the way around pretty good. Installation was pretty easy because of the designated hole to use nails/screws. I used screwed for more durability. Once night came, we turned on the lights and it lit up beautifully. I was not onboard with lights but had to install them for the wifey but I got to say I will be spending more time outside at night with the lights. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Bulbs will go out, sooner than you want!
customer_reviews.text: These lights look awesome, have heavy duty insulated wiring, and are coated in a durable rubbery material. Perfect for exterior conditions, EXCEPT THAT THE BULBS DO NOT LAST FOR ANY TIME AT ALL. As in both photos, you can see that these lights are spotty in reliability at best. I have hung them on the second story of my home as I was hoping the bulbs would last a decent amount of time before needing a change but was shocked when it only took about 1 month prior to half of them not working. Unsatisfied to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of the lights
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the lights. Unfortunately one month after we put them up FIVE of the bulbs have burned out in the last week! Not nearly the quality I was expecting. Extremely dissappointed. Outside of the return window because I waited a few months to put them up.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Really??? Lights Burned Out Too Soon:(
customer_reviews.text: I bought this “industrial” string April 9th 2019. I am a verified long time; relatively wide range Amazon shopper without bias. This product is currently touted number one by Amazon as best; most dependable hard core Amazon porch lighting products. By August 2019 50% of bulbs burned out, so I turned it off. Now when I search best industrial lighting porch strings this still come up as number one! Thought you should know! If you know of another product that really is long lasting, (looking for at least a year), bright, and industrial please share with us here! I need another actual fabulous solution, as FAST as ASAP:))) Lots of LUV to you and yours.
customer_reviews.author: Whisperer Girl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Ambiance for Backyard Patio
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to hang in the tree under a new patio we installed. When they arrived, it was evident they were of high quality right off the bat. Strong materials, not flimsy at all, and easy to hang. There' s a small mounting loop right above each bulb for zip-tie to go as well. Once hung, the lights provided the perfect amount of light for what we were going for. Check out he photos for an example. Very happy with this purchase. *This review is posted only a few days after we hung them, so if something changes and we find them to be faulty after the first good rain, I'll update the review.*
customer_reviews.author: dayton344

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Note to self - screw in bulbs AFTER you hang them! I broke about three bulbs trying to hang the lights with the bulbs already in. File under "user error." I threw an outdoor birthday party and needed lighting for the back yard. These were perfect - not too bright, but did the job. They look fantastic also. I did not need galvanized wire (I preferred them to "hang" a bit, rather than line up straight across). I used three strings total, as the yard is a large space. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Macdonald

customer_reviews.title: Love these lights!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous buying cafe lights for outside without seeing them in person. The reviews gave me enough confidence to pull the trigger. I bought 3 48ft strands and installed them yesterday. I attached them to 3 eye screws on the back of my house and ran them to 3 metal poles I sunk into the ground. 1 goes directly over my pool (secured this one very well on both ends) and the other 2go to the left and right of the pool. We tried them out last night and WOW they look amazing. Our friends and neighbors came by for dinner by the pool and they were blown away as well.
customer_reviews.author: JonFo

customer_reviews.title: High winds did not bother these at all
customer_reviews.text: We live just off the Puget Sound and had some strong winds come through. The trees were all moving a lot but the lights seem to barely notice it was windy. Granted I did use a heavy 1/8" steel wire and the lights are not in direct line of fire of the wind but they didn't move at all. Side note some of the lights are particularly fussy about how tight the bulb need to be screwed in to work so don't know if with time that will be a issue or not.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Jolly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality string lights - I have no doubt they'll last a while, and they definitely seem weatherproof to me. Thick cable, robust-feeling overall, and all of the bulbs were in tact (plus an extra). One thing to note: these are pretty bright when it's all said and done. 15 watts per bulb didn't sound like much, but when they're all hung up, wow! I'm considering lower wattage or removing every other bulb and covering the empty sockets. Either way, I highly recommend these if you're looking for a nice set of lights.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: DON’T WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your time or money. We opened these and tried to string them. Two bulbs were blown (after you had to unpack every tiny thing and assemble) and while we tried to hang them two more shattered when we plugged them in. On top of it, customer service trying to return that was ATROCIOUS and un helpful. I’m really looking forward to trying to package everything back up through shards of glass and return it. Ensure hope no one but me gets injured from this package. 👎🏼
customer_reviews.author: FP

customer_reviews.title: Not working after only 2 months 💔
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these lights exactly 2 months ago and loved them. But the other night we went out to plug them in and they don’t work anymore. We’re so bummed. We even tried to use another extension chord or outlet to see if they would make a different but they still won’t come on. We can’t return them because we’re outside the 30 day return window. Unfortunately we just have to eat that $50.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth R Powers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect incandescent string lights.
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted to incorporate bistro - typs lighting for years but could not find affordable, durable product the looked right. These lights are every bit as good as the product description states. Heavy duty cable, hefty light sockets, nice clean look. Warm, Incandescent amber glow versus cool blue/white led hues. I use them on a dimmer and can create any atmosphere I choose. They are so nice, in fact, that I ordered several more for other tasks. Very satisfied, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ERIC SUITER

customer_reviews.title: Bright but pretty
customer_reviews.text: These string lights are great. We didn’t get a remote control with our order and had no way to control the brightness...and they are very bright! But we purchased a dimmer separately that came with remotes so now our lights are perfect for us. Love them so much we bought them as a housewarming gift for our son and DIL. Other than the fact that two bulbs have already burned out and we’ve only had them installed a few weeks (?!), we still feel this is a great buy so far!
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: The Best Outdoor Lights
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a total of 4 sets of lights. The lights came packed very well and organized. The lights are of high quality construction and finish. I was impressed with the seamless watertight construction. The lights are suspended along 1/8th inch Galv. cable which is enough for 25' - 30' runs. The lights were hung along cable with black cable ties and move easily when tightened. I have got many compliments and the lights look great. I recommend getting the Woods 32555 remote control unit. Thank you for including a spare bulb. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For My Padio.
customer_reviews.text: If you like the retro look of outdoor string lighting, this is a product you might want to consider. The set I ordered came with 16 11W retro looking incandescent bulbs, 15 for the string with one extra. It is very well constructed and likely is waterproof. Just be sure the bulbs have cooled long before a rain. If not, a cool rain will cause the hot bulbs to explode. I didn't rate these for the remote control as that is not part of the set, is an extra available for purchase. wd wd
customer_reviews.author: W. D.

customer_reviews.title: "Edison Lights" are Super Cool!
customer_reviews.text: We love these lights because you have many choices of the color you want them to be! They are VERY durable and are on a thick, black cord. The only drawback to the lights is that the cord color only comes in black. We have two sets of the lights, the set you see in the picture on our patio (the cord is not visible to us in this shot), and we also have a second set which hang against our yellow house (not pictured here) and the black cord really sticks out like a sore thumb. If that sort of thing doesn't bother you aesthetically, then these lights are for you!
customer_reviews.author: Kitty B

customer_reviews.title: Commercial grade indeed.
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality molding, the material is sturdy but flexible enough to stretch the eyes over nail heads for semi-permanent installation.The bottom lip of the mold also seals against the bulb for great water resistance. The same goes for the plug, the prongs are molded tight. Every bulb was individually wrapped and boxed inside a box, in the box with the light string, in the amazon box! We picked up a slide dimmer to put in line and it's perfect for the firepit. Full brightness (see pic) for setup, then dim them down for whatever type crowd you have.
customer_reviews.author: Doobfucious

customer_reviews.title: EFFECT
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time ordering this product (1 48 feet and 1 24 feet). Very easy to attach to wall. Gives us the amount of light we were looking for. We both like these lights very much and make the patio and lanai look great at night. The remote control is what sold us on this product. No wires hanging down, everything is at the highest point on the wall. Very nice lighting effect. Been looking for years for something like these lights. Glad we made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John Ammon

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Lights (one flaw)
customer_reviews.text: Review Update... As you can see by my review below, l like these lights. I still like them, but I have found a flaw. The rubber loop holes above each bulb that are used to attach the string to hooks get brittle and break when directly exposed to the weather and sun. Original Review... I was very impressed with the quality of these lights. They are not anything like cheap looking Christmas light strings. Everything from the size of the lights to the spacing between each light was exactly what I wanted. They seem like they are very durable and will resist the outside elements well.
customer_reviews.author: MysticKnight

customer_reviews.title: Burnt out or not working bulbs
customer_reviews.text: When I receive the lighting I had it hung up and once we had it hung up we put the bulbs in and two of the bulbs were burnt out and I tried to get a hold of the company but because of Covid they’re not taking phone calls and so I tried to chat and couldn’t. They seem to be nice but if you can’t get the bulbs for ItI don’t think that would be good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality and look great
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Time will tell on their durability and weatherproofing. Took off one star for 2 bad bulbs right out of the box. Ordered 2 sets. Had 1 bad bulb per set. Luckily, they send 1 extra bulb per set, so I was able to get everything working. Suggest using stainless steel guide wire kit for the 48 ft set. These are heavy duty string lights.
customer_reviews.author: NoMoreWheatBelly

customer_reviews.title: Totally fangirling over these lights
customer_reviews.text: I agonized over whether to get these for our cabin, but so glad I did. Let me assure you these are heavy duty, super quality outdoor lights. They are AWESOME. Great looking Edison style and they put out an incredible soft but surprisingly bright light. They are perfect for playing cards on our deck in the pitch dark. Bright enough to see without straining but emit such a soft, pleasant light. Thinking about getting some for our BBQ area at home. Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CLH409

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, adds great atmosphere
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy lights and power cord. Easily attached these to some lower hanging branches in our back yard with some zip ties with enough slack to allow for movement on windy days. I added an in-line dimmer with a remote so I can operate the lights from inside the house. I got the dimmer because several reviews mentioned that the lights were too bright. I don't find that to be true in my backyard but I suppose it depends on your application location. The dimmer does add flexibility though. Very, very happy with these lights and will buy them again if I can find more places to put them.
customer_reviews.author: college mom

customer_reviews.title: Very bright.
customer_reviews.text: I installed these string lights over the pergola above our deck. They’ve been through a few decent storms and so far seem weather resistant. The cord is thick, which I suppose might indicate quality. They look very nice, but I felt they might be a bit too bright. I decided to pair the lights with a dimmer that came with a remote. I now believe the dimmer is a necessity. Changing the intensity of the lights really changes the atmosphere and mood. The lights are rated for use with a dimmer and respond well. I really like the way the bulbs look.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Joey and Murdoch

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with these lights! I was a little bit nervous that I would plug them in and they would not work, but they shine beautifully! They really light up my back porch. Each bulb is individually wrapped so you don’t have to worry about it getting busted during transport. I would definitely recommend these lights to anyone trying to light up their porch
customer_reviews.author: Bekah1278

customer_reviews.title: Worked less than one year
customer_reviews.text: I have had these less than a year and they don’t work. The crummy outdoor lights I bought at Joanne’s fabrics are still going, but these, seeming very heavy duty lights don’t work. Very disappointed, they LOOK so sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Scanlan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lights!
customer_reviews.text: These string lights were a great buy. I am very impressed with the commercial-grade quality; they are very well made and seem like they can withstand the outdoor elements. They produce a good amount of light without being too bright, and they are dimmable, which makes them perfect for ambient lighting. My only complaint is that the space between the last light on the string and the plug to connect another string is too long. I had to overlap the cord so that the distance between the lights was consistent. Not a huge deal though. Overall, I'm extremely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Laviolette

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor lights for our patio!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with these lights! They were easy to install and provide great lighting on our patio. I was originally contemplating a second set for good lighting, but this one 48' string provides plenty of nice, warm light. I hung them on a cable to reduce strain on the light cord, and opted to zip-tie the cord directly to the cable instead of using the hanging hole. It gave us a much more streamline look. VERY pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Strenk

customer_reviews.title: I was super skeptical of these because it had so many 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: I was super skeptical of these because it had so many 5 star reviews and a lot of the reviews looked like they posted stock photos. But these are actually really good. They are REALLY durable. The cord is way heavier than I thought so I for sure believe it's weatherproof. I wanted to hook these up to my dimmer switch, but these aren't harsh at all so I don't think it's necessary. Most retail stores sell 24 foot lights for $40-50 so these are a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tom V Weekes

customer_reviews.title: After 4 years, still like new.
customer_reviews.text: We hung these lights in our backyard 4 years ago and they are still working great despite being exposed to all the worst weather Chicago has to offer and being turned on all night, every night. Most of the bulbs are still the original ones that came with it. We just got a new house and I’m buying even more of these lights, that’s how satisfied I am with this product.
customer_reviews.author: ATBABS

customer_reviews.title: They are heavy and sturdy especially the string
customer_reviews.text: 16 bulbs included. The whole string contains 15bulbs. These are definitely not your average string light that you buy from Walmart or target or even Lowe's or other home improvement places. They are heavy and sturdy especially the string. Who can call these strings strings. They're thick like larger appliance power cord. The bulbs are BRIGHT BRIGHT. Much brighter than your regular string light. Be careful installing these though. I'm super inexperienced 25yo female, and I broke a bulb almost immediately as I started stringing them but good thing they anticipated that and included an extra bulb. Very satisfied with his purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Saki Minami

customer_reviews.title: We just bought more!
customer_reviews.text: We live in Iowa, I only mention that because we had a derecho about a month ago and every bulb made it. That means they survived 100+ mph winds. Great lights, NOT LED if that matters to you. Works with the Alexa enabled controller we bought. Little to no effect on our electric house bill and we sit outside about 5 nights a week.
customer_reviews.author: Chris MacKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality!!
customer_reviews.text: As I’m writing the review I saw the ‘remote control’ wanting a star, and I’m like THERE’S A REMOTE CONTROL?! Haha! I might have to double check if we were supposed to get that because that would be awesome! Lights alone are amazing! Hubby built a cable cord onto our gazebo and then zip tied the lights around the perimeter of the gazebo, perfect ambience! I love a good mellow light when relaxing at night on the patio, and this is perfect considering just 2 nights ago we were outside basking in the light of the pool. Lol. Buy these you won’t be disappointed! Now off to find my remote!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Don’t even bother buying!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money! I was very disappointed with these lights. I purchased them to decorate my backyard for Thanksgiving and that was a total fail! 6 lights did not work and 1 came broken. Very upset I need a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Haidee Perez

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be high quality. The went up easily, and look fantastic. They add a perfect amount of light for grilling and hanging out on my covered porch. I almost ordered the Edison bulbs with the 30 inch spacing, but these are great and I love saving money. Wish there was an on/off toggle switch, other than that, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gimmedap

customer_reviews.title: They don’t connect properly (the spacing)
customer_reviews.text: I’d give them 5 stars but the way they connect leaves a huge gap between lights. They need half the distance of cord on each end. It’s impossible to take up the slack on a wire without looking dumb. Consider a different model if you plan on connecting these anywhere but at the end of a run.
customer_reviews.author: gnomehole

customer_reviews.title: Low quality materials, not durable
customer_reviews.text: Despite the premium price tags, the materials are far from. When ordering these lights I decided it would be worth the investment to buy something durable as its outside and will remain up all year. Mine have managed to stay up only 1 week. Two of the hanging loops used to hold up the lights have broken, causing the lights to drop and smash. This also meant crawling around on the grass to try to find all of the glass so it doesn't end up in my dogs paws!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Prince

customer_reviews.title: Work great and are really reliable
customer_reviews.text: We have had these lights up about 6-8 months so far and they are still working great. The light is perfectly warm, but also bright enough to not need additional lights around the patio where we have them installed. I also plugged them into a Kasa wifi plug and can control them from both my Alexa and my Samsung SmartThings hub. These things are great. They look great, they operate great and they were super easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Wrong Side of Texas Records

customer_reviews.title: But they still work well for little covered back porches like mine. Great product
customer_reviews.text: We have a small to medium sized covered back porch. The lights we had were leftover from the previous owner, and my wife really wanted some along this style. When they arrived, I realized how heavy duty they were and was concerned about how they looked and if they would hang on regular sized nails. As it turned out, there was no reason for concern. They seem heavy duty enough to use outside for larger patio settings or if you have outdoor seating at a a restaurant. But they still work well for little covered back porches like mine. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: As described and well functioning. However, after a ...
customer_reviews.text: As described and well functioning. However, after a couple of months, most of the bulbs have died and have needed to be replaced. Not expensive to do as they are simply incandescent bulbs, but a hassle due to the mounting at the edge of my deck roof. Buy a large pack of replacement bulbs and expect to be changing them out regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Path914

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy!!! Bright and easy to put up too!!! All around the best lights I've ever bought. I've spent so much money when I should have just got these all along.
customer_reviews.author: ursula h

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: These lights look amazing! I'm pleasantly surprised by the amount of light they give off. I got them because I wanted to add some ambiance to our new gazebo. These lights have provided that and more. I have gotten loads of compliments on them. I used a 16g wire to hang them and plugged them in to an outdoor remote/timer controlled extension cord. I couldn't be happier with this product The package arrived on time and in good condition. When I opened the box, the cord was neatly coiled and the bulbs were in individual boxes and wrapped in bubble wrap inside to keep them safe. There was even an additional bulb in case one was broken on arrival
customer_reviews.author: svg300wsm

customer_reviews.title: Only four bulbs lit
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like nice quality materials, but when I screwed in all the bulbs, only four of them lit. The problem was not the bulbs, it was in the wiring or the sockets themselves. I tried a known-good bulb of my own and it did not light, and a bulb that did not light in this product, lit in another lamp of mine. Instant return for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Trace

customer_reviews.title: A+ lightning and A+ wires.
customer_reviews.text: These are industry type lights. Not your cheap lights you can find at a retail store. Very well made, strong, thick wires. Lights up my backyard! Beautiful lighting! I definitely recommend these! I added pictures with the lights on and same place with them off to see the amazing different! We have the on the house and they light up our entire back yard!
customer_reviews.author: frances

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are amazing. They look adorable in the backyard. They provide the perfect amount of lighting. The only reason I am giving it 4 stars is that two of the light bulbs burned out as soon as we connected them but I’ll be contacting the provider to try and get replacements. Will update after I talk to them. Regardless of the two burned bulbs we loved them and ordered another set. Note: if you tighten the bulbs too much they won’t turn on. So before you think they don’t work try loosing them up a bit first
customer_reviews.author: Ccarreon

customer_reviews.title: So good, I bought another set
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I replaced a set of outdoor lights (C7 bulbs I believe) with the Brightech Edison lights, 48 foot string. The packaging was great - not one bulb damaged. The product is also very good. The main cable that the Edison lights hang from is of a good heavy gauge. These are 11 watt bulbs and they have a nice warm glow that is perfect for an outdoor space. So I bought a second set to be used as ambient lighting for an acoustic musical group I'm in. Good product, good company.
customer_reviews.author: H2K

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality, very pretty outdoor lights that are holding up well!
customer_reviews.text: These are very good quality lights. I was really concerned about spending money on lights that I see broken and half working all over the backyards in the city. So I decided to spend a little more money and hope that these things would last. So far, so very good! We are thrilled with the quality and these lights look fantastic. Absolutely worth every penny. I bought a "wireless remote control" to go with them so we plug them in in the garage and then have the remote inside so we can turn them on from inside and its an ideal set up.
customer_reviews.author: KBD

customer_reviews.title: Failing shortly after a year
customer_reviews.text: These are just regular old-fashioned bulbs, no LEDs. Please note that it says in the description at the bottom that the company only gives a THREE MONTH warranty on the bulbs. I bought this about a year ago, and now I have to replace about 5 of the 15 lightbulbs. I don't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jurgen Braungardt

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived and I put them up. There a little weight to them, due to the fact that they are weather proof and commercial grade. I wanted something with ambiance for my back deck and I really like them. I read the reviews before I purchased and they were all good. The bulbs were wrapped separately in small boxes and I saved them for packing away for the winter. The bulbs are not hot after having them on all night.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Not all light sockets work...
customer_reviews.text: I'm shocked at the good reviews for these lights. I purchased these only to find that two of the sockets did not work (I.e. Lights would not turn on for those specific sockets). This happened even when I switched out the bulbs thinking maybe the bulbs were burned out. I contacted Amazon and they sent me a replacement set of lights. You can imagine how surprised I was when the same problem occurred! I'm returning both sets of lights. Don't waste your time. Ps: a number of the light bulbs were burnt out in both sets too. Awful quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amie R. Aldana

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my purchase. This is as good as the feedbacks from all the customers. It is very robust, weather proof, and the quality of light is great. I bought the 48' version and hung it across the roof of my side yard. For any of the folks thinking of doing DIY, you must consider the other KJXXKJ Stainless steel globe light kit and TR88302 cable tie. I also added an extension cord and a auto dawn to dusk light switch sensor. It took me about 2 hours to put it up by myself.
customer_reviews.author: CWL

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy! Bulbs burn out way too fast
customer_reviews.text: I too was surprised at how quickly these burned out- ALL bulbs were toast after only 6 months. The previous homeowners had left some cheap looking string lights at the other end of the property and even those have lasted over 2 years. Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: No BULBS ?
customer_reviews.text: I bought the exact same product when the second order did not come with bulbs ?
customer_reviews.author: eric mendoza

customer_reviews.title: 2 boxes were defective.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two new boxes of 48 lights each and both boxes were defective. 2 lights from one box did not work and 1 light from the second box was defective. I took great care in installing and hanging the lights so it was nothing on my end. The manufacturer sent out 2 defective products.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sure I ordered the solar version, but good quality
customer_reviews.text: These look great, and would be 5 stars, but I ordered the SOLAR lights off my wish list to decorate around a remote fire pit area and was extremely disappointed when I received the longer version, but they were PLUG IN! (Same price I guess) The quality is really good so I’ll reassign these to a side porch instead of returning.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Mountain Mama

customer_reviews.title: Provides great ambiance
customer_reviews.text: I was gifted a strand of these lights and liked them so much I purchased another. We have them on our gazebo and deck railing. They provide a really nice ambiance when the sun goes down. They give a nice soft warm light that. If I had more places to put them, I would buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Jcundiff

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty awesomeness !
customer_reviews.text: I have used several string lights over the years, and they always fail over time. So I decided to get a “ heavy duty “ set, and these lights are definitely heavy duty. The cords are thick and well put together, and the bulbs are replaceable. I put a dimmer with remote control on my lights because they are a little bright ( as is ) for my application & taste. The picture shows the light as is without the dimmer. In closing, if you are tired of all the “ cheap “ outdoor lights, get these, you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Few bulbs went out very quickly, one didn't work out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Cord itself is highly durable, very good quality. But what's with the cheap bulbs. You might as well just not include them rather than include these low quality bulbs. Really soured me on an otherwise good products.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: These don't work for long!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So extremely dissatisfied and disappointed in these lights. More than half of the bulbs went out in less than 3 months. I had 2 strands and both were the same. They were great the first month when they worked. Company says that mine were "just outside the 3 month window" to get them replaced. SO...don't buy them if you want them to work more than 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but
customer_reviews.text: These lights are very nice and change the atmosphere of our pool area but for some reason the bulbs turn off when screwed in all the way (does not make sense to me), I thought it may be because of how the bulbs are packaged with the bubble wrap tightly but I cleaned them pretty good and still the same issue. I was going to purchase another set but if there is any wind and the lights sway a bit, a few turn off. I may have just received a bad batch but I will not be purchasing more due to the possibility of the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Mac

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. Heavy cable, drops are double jacketed. I have them spanning 25' using a 14 gauge wire. They were easy to install using the built in loops and then zip tying them to the wire. The light is soft and very appropriate for our patio set up. I hooked them up to a remote controlled outdoor outlet. Push the button, voila, instant relaxation. The female end of the cable is a non grounded receptacle.
customer_reviews.author: E. Varley

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Market Lights
customer_reviews.text: We have only had our lights up for a few days so I can't give a review yet on the durability of the lights. However, I CAN say that when I opened the box up I was EXTREMELY pleased with the quality of the lights. They are very heavy duty, like commercial grade lights. We purchase a remote control dimmer for them and love the versatility of the lighting for our patio. Because of the weight of the light strand we upgraded our initial plans of how we were going to hang them. As others have commented, you would not want to attach this to your gutters as they would could possibly damage them from the pulling weight.
customer_reviews.author: sjbpstew

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love the lights. I hung them (3 strands) one Friday afternoon. My wife and I have been wanting the café light look over our back patio for years! These are what I would call commercial grade so you'll need some fairly sturdy poles if you connect them to and from your house. I used 1" EMT.
customer_reviews.author: BTA

customer_reviews.title: These are the best lights I have seen and I have used several ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the best lights I have seen and I have used several different types. They provide a longer strand and are clearly better put together. I run them on a wire, which I recommend for all these lights but I saw a set hanging up without a wire this weekend which was ok but just not quite as attractive. The way they are set up makes putting them on a wire very easy. This is a good product at a good price and will really sharpen your outdoor areas.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Choate

customer_reviews.title: how easty to install.
customer_reviews.text: The lights are absolutely beautiful and add so much to my front porch. They hooks to hold them in the ceiling are perfect and the bulbs can easily be bought at a light specialist store in town at a very reasonable price. They look terrific and like any other light bulb they need replacing on occasion especially in this awful Florida heat and humidity. I will be ordering more in the near future. I highly recommend these lights for any outside use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent exterior lighting product. Love the bulbs and lighting. We installed on our pergola over the patio, The light is bright and clear. We added a lamp dimmer switch that creates a wonderful range of light depending on your mood or the experience you desire. These are high quality commercial light. Went to a patio restaurant and saw the same lighting.
customer_reviews.author: mdhomes

customer_reviews.title: So perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love these outdoor lights! We had an Arbor built for parties and evenings just being together and the lights are just the right light/ ambiance. So pretty it looks like a designer picture. Water proof so the elements do not hurt them. Love my outdoor area so.
customer_reviews.author: K nurse

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pergola
customer_reviews.text: We hung these lights on the inside of our 12x12 wood pergola. They are a beautiful addition and we have had many people comment on them. They came with an extra bulb (none of mine were broken) which was very nice. The cord is very "rubbery" and flexible, which makes for easy hanging. It is thicker than a traditional cord. I have them on a timer and love the glow when they come on. Incandescent lights are so much nicer than the blue-white LED lights. I leave them up year-round (even through MN winters!). Quality product - worth the extra cost not to keep purchasing cheap lights and spending time hanging them!
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great lights
customer_reviews.text: These lights are perfect lighting to chill on the back patio. They are bright enough to see the grill perfectly when it's dark out during the winter too. The only thing you may have to do is use a flathead screwdriver to pull up the prongs in the sockets of some lights to get them to work.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Irvin

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but bulbs don't seem to be great quality
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I was looking for and ended up being exactly what I expected. The cord feels very durable, although I haven't had any weather yet to test it. They give off a lot of great light... When the bulbs are illuminated of course. Within 10 minutes of turning them on, 3 of the bulbs blew. They do give you one extra, but it's pretty annoying that they go out that easily. Hopefully these were duds and the rest of them last a reasonable amount of time. Would love some replacement bulbs if the company received this review...
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Very good packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 150’. Good product. Had to purchase coated steel wire to suspend product using zipties at each light. Also bought heavy duty hooks and adjustable tension hardware for each end. Dug hole for wood post secured by concrete. “She” is very happy with my install job and im pretty confident going the extra mile will extend performance of product. I would recommend longer ends to allow for ease of connection.
customer_reviews.author: Night Train

customer_reviews.title: Buy these lights great quality...spend the money its worth it...
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights! They come nicely packaged and arrived on time. 1 bulb extra in each set-out of the 4 strings we purchased 3 bulbs didn't work. They are bright when on fully lite up my whole yard. Highly suggest a dimmer! Along with the lights we bought the guide wire worked well together no sagging... We hung them about 10 feet high maybe 11 at some points... I will say do not buy this dimmer it burned out the second time we used it and got very very hot!! FIRE HAZARD for sure-returned it.  We will be attaching a new dimmer when we receive it Ill update soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Would’ve been nice if all the bulbs worked
customer_reviews.text: Received a defective product. 8 out of the 15 bulbs do not work and they only give you one extra bulb in the box. Very upset I spent $50 on a product that is useless. Had to request a new set of lights be sent out. The second set of lights lasted less than 3 months before the bulbs blew out again!
customer_reviews.author: Bel

customer_reviews.title: Quality lighting
customer_reviews.text: I never did find the remote control. But by the time I had it up and placed I'm not returning the item. It is a beautiful accessory to my patio. Well worth the money even I paid $20 over other listings. My bad I should have looked further.
customer_reviews.author: Katieofcolor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome exterior ambience lights
customer_reviews.text: High quality well insulated electrical cable. The bulbs produce a very nice glow. Our camp is stituated deep into our forest, it’s pitch black here at night, these bulbs are perfect to create ambience. For now 200’ feet (4 strands) where installed, I may add more. Each strand comes with an extra bulb. A good thing, since I. broke 2 bulbs while installing the 4 light strands I purchased. When installing, remember it’s glass, be careful when installing.
customer_reviews.author: Francois Asselin

customer_reviews.title: Good outdoor string lights
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these lights to use as string lights in my backyard. Was impressed with the quality of the product, lights come on a heavy wire with good insulation. The product came in a durable box and the lightbulbs were individually boxed so that not a single bulb was broken or didn’t work. The lights have endured a VERY rainy season and still function perfectly, however we did not give them very heavy use. All in all, a good product I have been quite satisfied with. Would buy these again from same manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Louwho

customer_reviews.title: LARGER THAN I IMAGINED!
customer_reviews.text: This will come as a great surprise for people who planned to string them across large spaces, but for me they ere a little too big. Thats not a complaint - just a comment! They are also very sturdy and very well made. But I also didnt realise they are USA wattage so needed a converter to use.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Kibinge

customer_reviews.title: Energy hogs and not easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Low quality compared to the LED ones I have and use ten times as much energy and have glass bulbs that you have to assemble and no instructions. Going back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy with confidence
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these combined with the 16 gauge galvanized wire thru Amazon to complete a surprise project in our pool area for my wife. I was pleasantly surprised at how well they are packaged. Bulbs are individually boxed in small protective boxes inside the main box and the quality of the light strands are that of a really heavy gauge extension cord. I felt completely safe hanging them over our pool. A strong storm within days barely tested the lights and galvanized wired holding them.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great durability!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these light about two years ago and installed them outside at my place in Tamarindo, Costa Rica. They've been exposed to all of the elements full time since then. There have been zero problems at all. Not even one incandescent bulb has burned out in those two years. Phenomenal build quality! The brightness is perfect at night(without a dimmer), and the color of the bulbs is warm and inviting at night. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Tristan P.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Heavy Duty; Used Paracord for support
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful lights for our patio. We strung black paracord (much, much less expensive than the copper wire some others have suggested) and attached the light string to the paracord using black cable ties, then clipping the unneeded cable tie ends. The result is beautiful. We had some very heavy winds (>60 mph gusts) and the lights did just fine. The glow is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Great lighting and size, but bulbs fragile
customer_reviews.text: The light strands are sturdy and the bulbs are large and bright. However, the bulbs are fairly fragile. They function well in rain and even wind, but once a bulb taps a hard surface like a wall or metal it breaks. Be careful as I purchased four packs of these lights and broke 5 bulbs in the process of hanging due to this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie E. Supnick

customer_reviews.title: I like the quality of the wiring
customer_reviews.text: Just installed these lights. They are just as described and work very well. The bulbs come well packed and nothing was broken. I like the quality of the wiring, it has good flexibility and since I chose to put j-hooks into my deck where the mounting loops actually ended up, it was very easy to work with. It would be nice to have a longer lead of wire before the strand of lights begins, but I'm sure that would add to the cost and perhaps not be needed on some installations. I would definitely buy this again and might do so if I remodel my deck space.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Look great on our deck!
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy good looking product. We string the lights around our deck and hot tub. Easy to install. The end with the plug is short. We bought a black outdoor extension cord to reach the socket without hiding the lights on the end.
customer_reviews.author: lauriegd

customer_reviews.title: Heavy cord to me means quality and nice bulbs
customer_reviews.text: We recently had our house repainted. So, I wanted to replace the cafe lights we had (green cord) with a darker cord to blend with our dark brown trim. I was initially worried because there are less lights on these strands than what we had. But, to my surprise the lights provide the same ambience and light we had but with a nicer quality bulb, cord (black), and weatherproof. We are happy with our purchase. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Ptownmom9206

customer_reviews.title: Happy Accident
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these on accident, thinking they were solar ones I had previously looked at. So when I opened the box and realized they weren’t solar I was bummed because I could no longer put them in the spot I was planning, but once I took out the lights and saw how beautiful they were plugged in I decided to keep them and put them on our front porch. I am SO glad I did! Perfect amount of light and great ambience for a great price. They are very sturdy and I can tell they will last awhile
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Recommended! High quality product, nice ambiance
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and super heavy duty wire- these are built to last. I strung two together to wrap around my backyard. Really adds great ambiance! Not too bright, not too dim, just right. Note that these are definitely incandescent bulbs which might be fragile when installing and will use more electricity than a comparable LED. Price would probably double if LED though (and besides, you could just change out to LED in the future, the strands are going to last a while)
customer_reviews.author: chris8519

customer_reviews.title: Backyard lit beautifully
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Bulbs bubble wrapped and boxed individually...including a spare. Really can't compare to another brand...first ones I've owned. Fastened these using zip ties...to a steal wire I strung first. Everything worked out of the box. The cable has a nice thick jacket on it...like a heavy extension cord. Bulbs run cool even after being on for several hours on a summer night. Bought four 48' strands. Stainless steal wire and black zip ties purchased separately.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Epperson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lighting
customer_reviews.text: These lights were exactly what I was looking for. The perfect lightning for guests no bright lights or white. These are a very soft glow through clear bulbs! I would highly recommend!! Absolutely beautiful lighting!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya H.

customer_reviews.title: Great vintage look, bright & easy to hang
customer_reviews.text: These lights have a nice retro look, and provide more light than I expected. I received the exact number of bulbs needed to fill the strand and all bulbs were in working order. I hung them on my screened in porch and they were very easy to hang. First I hammered a nail in the wood above the windows every 3-4 feet. There is a small hole just above each light that you can slip over the nail and the lights hang securely in place. There in no on/off switch included, you just plug/unplug the cord to turn on/off the lights. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AOC

customer_reviews.title: The light string is a quality product that won't dissapoint.
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the light string - quality product, built to last in outdoor environments, replacement bulb included, nicely packaged, and great lighting for the back yard BBQ area. I liked so much that I bought 4 additional strings. 2 prong plug and I was able to connect all 5 strings together. Would certainly recommend and purchase again. Also impressed with their customer service checking with me to see if all was as advertised. I like that! Would strongly recommend that you string guide/hanging wire to support light string when hanging. Due to the quality of the product, the string is a bit too heavy to run without wire support.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Hopkins III

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lights.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, well made. Used galvanized wire to support them, then wire ties to hold them up. Put them on my deck sitting area set to an automatic timer. Wow!. They provide just the right amount of lighting, look really nice, not too bright, not too dim, just right. I am going to get another set for the other side of my desk, I like them that much. Fast shipping, packed well and an extra bulb just in case. These lights are going to hold up very well to the weather and outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Skip Hammack

product_meta.title: Brightech Ambience Pro - Waterproof Outdoor String Lights - Hanging Industrial 11W Edison Bulbs - 48 Ft Vintage Bistro Lights - Create Great Ambience in Your Backyard, Gazebo
feature_bullets: PATIO DROP LIGHTS CREATE A CLASSIC CAFE AMBIENCE IN YOUR EXTERIOR SPACE: String up Ambience Pro lights on your pergola, porch or other outside space to create a great atmosphere to relax and/or entertain guests. These vintage Edison string lights with old-fashioned filaments give off a warm, old time glow so that you can come home after a busy day and enjoy your very own retreat.

HEAVY DUTY, COMMERCIAL GRADE WEATHERPROOF LIGHTS HAVE SURVIVED 50MPH WINDS: These yard lights are durable thanks to Brightech's industrial grade WeatherTite Technology. These lights are waterproof and have withstood Nor'Easters blowing at 50 MPH, per reviews! They are UL listed, and the extra thick light cord is flexible. Confidently leave these string lights on display year round.

HANG UP A CANOPY OF ALEXA COMPATIBLE EDISON STRAND LIGHTS FOR WEDDINGS, PARTIES ETC. : Create a warm atmosphere with these retro filament Edison bulbs. Add a festoon touch to a wedding reception, cocktail party, birthday, BBQ, carnival etc. Each 48 foot strand contains 15 hanging 11 Watt bulbs spaced 3 feet apart. Works with Alexa to turn on/off, requires hub sold separately. Connect up to 8 strands end to end.

BEST DIMMABLE ELECTRIC PLUG IN LIGHTS SET THE RIGHT MOOD INDOOR OR OUT: For mood lighting on the balcony or in the bedroom, wire the rope to a dimmer switch. Ideal for a romantic dinner for two, an elegant nighttime celebration, or a wedding reception. Use indoors or out, the choice is yours.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars4,882 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
